result.name: ukccsrc-call-1-project-experimental-investigation-and-cfd-modelling-of-oxy-coal-combustion-on-p
result.notes: The project will investigate the impacts of real flue gas and vent gas recycling on the combustion performance, emissions, ignition and flame stability of oxy-coal combustion by means of 250kW PACT facility testing and comprehensively validated CFD modelling, and to assess various flue gas recycling scenarios and the benefits of vent gas recycling by process simulation. Grant number: UKCCSRC-C1-27.

organization.name: british-geological-survey
organization.title: British Geological Survey (BGS)
organization.description:
A world-leading geoscience centre for survey and monitoring; modelling and research; data and knowledge.

https://www.bgs.ac.uk/home.html

result.title: UKCCSRC Call 1 Project: Experimental investigation and CFD modelling of oxy-coal combustion on PACT facility with real flue gas and vent gas recycling

This staff member should revert to the IPR Section (ipr@bgs.ac.uk) for advice, should the position not be clear."]
